plot: The villainous Ursula (from the Little Mermaid) is terrorizing a little boy and preventing him from sleeping. He goes under the grate to track her down and silence her for good.
title: Under the Grate
plot_es: The villainous Ursula (from the Little Mermaid) is terrorizing a little boy and preventing him from sleeping. He goes under the grate to track her down and silence her for good.
plot_en: The villainous Ursula (from the Little Mermaid) is terrorizing a little boy and preventing him from sleeping. He goes under the grate to track her down and silence her for good.
